nodes.title: Experiencing Homes in VR
nodes.description: A computer vision and deep learning based project that enables the user to try on spectacles, watches and other accessories virtually.

nodes.title: Image Colorization
nodes.description: The aim of the project was to create a model that takes a grayscale (black and white) image as input and then produces a visually plausible and perceptually meaningful colorized output image as output. We used U-net and conditional GAN to solve the problem at hand. To avoid the problem of the blind leading the blind in the GAN game where neither generator nor discriminator knows anything about the task at the beginning of training, we pretrained the generator separately.

nodes.title: Stock Trading Bot
nodes.description: We designed a deep learning model that predicts the future stock price using prices/returns and volumes.
